title: Customizable Ambient Music Pack
description: 12 customizable and seamlessly looping ambient music tracks varying from joyful to eerie and calm to tense. The final mix of the tracks is made inside sound cues, so you can mix the music quickly further to perfectly suit your needs!
longDescription:
The pack of 12 customizable and seamlessly looping ambient music tracks varying from joyful to eerie and calm to tense. The final mix of the tracks is made inside sound cues, so you can mix the music quickly further to perfectly suit your needs! You can, for example, use a solo instrument or an sfx track, adjust the volume levels for added variation, or even create spatial effects by playing individual instruments in slightly different locations. Thus, the music in this pack offers much more flexibility than ordinary soundtracks! Ready-made mixes are also included.


Preview of the default tracks is available at: https://soundcloud.com/rytmigorilla/customizable-ambient-music-pack
technicalDetails:
• 12 customizable, seamlessly looping tracks
  • 12 ready-made, non-customizable mixes of default tracks
  • Total number of samples: 62
  • Total number of sound cues: 24
  • Sample quality: 44 100 Hz/16 bit stereo wav
  • BPM info provided with each track

 

List of default tracks:

  • Serenity (2:12, 5 instruments)
  • Wasteland Caravan (2:25, 5 instruments)
  • Celestial Realm (3:23, 3 instruments)
  • Abyss (1:50, 5 instruments)
  • Longing, for Piano, Harp and Strings (1:57, 4 instruments)
  • Travelling through Time and Space (1:41, 4 instruments)
  • Loneliness (1:53, 3 instruments)
  • Ruins (2:48, 5 instruments)
  • Abandoned (1:57, 5 instruments)
  • Lost Orbit (2:00, 3 instruments)
  • Hostile Droids (1:50, 5 instruments)
  • Wormhole (2:06, 3 instruments)

 

Running time of default tracks: 26:04

Total running time of instrument layers: 1:51:36

Intended platforms: All (tested on PC)
